Package remodel.util

Class Top

java.lang.Object
remodel.util.Top
Direct Known Subclasses:
TopRule
public abstract class Top
extends java.lang.Object
Top is a default abstract root class for generated Java classes. It provides common implementation support for all generated concepts and transformations.

Support methods are provided to convert any object into a PureSet or PureList. These are postfix operations in ReMoDeL, but are converted into static generic functions to allow Java to infer the resulting PureSet or PureList type. There are three overloaded versions for each operation, to create a singleton, to convert a group to the other kind, or to leave a group of the resulting kind unchanged.

Support methods are provided to convert the case conventions of Java Strings. These are postfix operations in the ReMoDeL String type, but are converted into static functions to avoid having to extend the Java String type. A support method is provided to evaluate a sequence and return the value of the last expression in the sequence.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons
